title: League login problems
body: Can't log into the new league startup. I use the right user and pass but still won't let me log in. Reinstalled it 3 times still won't work please help.

replies.body: I'd like to help, but just need a little bit more detail.  When you input your login info, what does the error message say exactly?  Are you also connected to your correct region on the patcher?  Let me know!
I found out how to login, my server was set to the Oceania Server.

I have the same problem. When I attempt to login, it says, "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists contact support at support.riotgames.com." I have been to many forums over the past 3 hours including utilizing the HRT and have submitted a ticket including my LoL Logs. I saw someone say they sent a ticket advised by a Rioter, but with no reply (according to the user). Ever since the legacy client has retired this has been an issue for many people including myself. Please help, or find a way. Thank you.
